categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles Mini Movies

nodes.text: The Dark Side Rises is a two-minute LEGO Mini Movie that is connected to LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles animated TV series. It is the third video and was released on YouTube on October 7, 2013.

Back at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, Jedi Master Yoda is teaching the Padawans how to destroy a Corporate Alliance tank droid when he feels a disturbance in the Force. Count Dooku and General Grievous have captured a Clone trooper.

Darth Sidious then contacts the Separatist leaders to ask them why his Sith clone army is still not ready. Dooku claims that they are still working on it. Dooku and Grievous leave on their modified stealth starfighter but it is shot down by an LAAT gunship and crashes in the middle of a battle on Geonosis. Grievous is crushed by a broken wing during the crash and Dooku is forced to carry the damaged cyborg.

The two Separatists are caught in the middle of a Separatist retreat on Geonosis. Soon Master Mace Windu arrives on another gunship to lead the Clone army to victory. Dooku and Grievous take that chance to commandeer the gunship and flee to Coruscant. Approaching Coruscant, they are contacted by Darth Sidious who asks them if they have the genetic material. Dooku assures him they do and Sidious expresses his desire to create a new Sith clone army to destroy their enemies. A brief clip of an army of Dark side clones in cloning tanks are shown before the screen fades out.
